metadata.synopsis: Romance banter reacting to player and Astarion Act 1 romance progression

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: I see you waste no time pursing your quarry, Astarion.
2.context: NodeContext: Referring to Astarion and player beginning to date, amused by it

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Tell me, do you always woo your lovers with such patient attention?
1.context: NodeContext: Poking fun because it all happened so quickly

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: I rather thought I was a little slow this time. Usually, they're begging me to drain them on the first night.
